original_text: So these five women went to buy some oil. While they were away, the man arrived for the marriage party. The five wise women were ready. They went with him into the house for the party. Then the servants shut the door.
korean_text: 그들이 사러 간 사이에 신랑이 오므로 준비하였던 자들은 함께 혼인 잔치에 들어가고 문은 닫힌지라

sentences.original_text: So these five women went to buy some oil.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이 다섯 여인들은 기름을 사러 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: the man arrived for the marriage party.
The five wise women were ready.
sentences.korean_translation: 슬기로운 다섯 처녀는 준비가 되어 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They went with him into the house
Then the servants shut the door.
